trans-unit.source: Base class that represents an email attachment.
trans-unit.target: 表示電子郵件附件的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Classes <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.Attachment" />, <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource" /> derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.Attachment" />、<see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource" /> 類別都衍生自這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 將新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> 具現化。

trans-unit.source: A stream containing the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 資料流，包含此附件的內容。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> 產生 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contentStream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contentStream" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The file name holding the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 保存此附件內容的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> with the specified file name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的檔案名稱，產生 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fileName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A stream containing the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 資料流，包含此附件的內容。

trans-unit.source: The type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容的類型。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentType" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，產生 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentType" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contentStream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contentStream" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contentType" /> is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contentType" /> 不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: A stream containing the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 資料流，包含此附件的內容。

trans-unit.source: The MIME media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容的 MIME 媒體類型。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and media type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> 和媒體類型，產生 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contentStream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contentStream" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mediaType" /> is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mediaType" /> 不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: The file name holding the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 保存此附件內容的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容的類型。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> with the specified file name and content type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的檔案名稱和內容類型，產生 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fileName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contentType" /> is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contentType" /> 不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: The file name holding the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 保存此附件內容的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The MIME media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容的 MIME 媒體類型。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> with the specified file name and media type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的檔案名稱和媒體類型，產生 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fileName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mediaType" /> is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mediaType" /> 不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the MIME content ID for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個附件的 MIME 內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> holding the content ID.
trans-unit.target: 包含內容識別碼的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set <see cref="P:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.ContentId" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.ContentId" /> 設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content stream of this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個附件的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The content stream of this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 這個附件的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個附件的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentType" />。

trans-unit.source: The content type for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 這個附件的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: **Note** Always call <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**永遠呼叫<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase.Dispose%2A>您釋放最後一個參考之前<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding of this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個附件的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding" />。

trans-unit.source: The encoding for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 這個附件的編碼方式。
